channel.title: Java on Joan Perals — UX Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Joan Perals — UX Developer

item.title: Big Bother
item.description: Big Bother (sic) is a generative sketch that features an eye on a large screen. This eye has the ability to mutate a little when it detects movement around: a new pupil appears to follow every “target”, with the aim to follow each watcher individually.

item.title: Garbuix
item.description: Exploring diverse patterns in 2D particle systems, using Processing. Garbuix (/gəɾβúʃ/) is the combination of a Processing sketch with a web-based user interface to explore visually interesting behaviours of 2D systems.
